entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.IO.IOException: Unable to write data to the transport connection: Broken pipe. #86227
  • [BUG] .NET acts weirdly on wrapped native libraries #86224
  • `System.Text.Json` source generator creates default type converters for properties with `JsonConverter` attribute #86223
  • `System.Text.Json` ignores `JsonConverter` attribute #86222
  • Cannot convert efficiently a System.Numerics.Vector4 to a Vector3 #86220
  • [API Proposal]: update legacy apis with ICollection<T> / IReadOnlyCollection<T>/ IEnumerabe<T> #86219
  • Parallel.ForEach is actually slow #86218
  • Deadlock with typed HttpClient with DI and HttpClientFactory #86217
  • IOS Push Notification Sending Failed with SSL Connection Error #86214

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Add ImmutableArray.Contains overload that accepts an IEqualityComparer<T> #66758
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix warnings found with CA1861 Avoid constant arrays as arguments #86229
    area-Meta
  • Move ternlog recognition to lower #86228
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • Initial work to enable EventPipe in Linux #86226
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • enable TieredPGO by default #86225
    NO-MERGE, area-TieredCompilation-coreclr
  • link to the latest version of Framework Design Guidelines #86216
    area-Meta, community-contribution

Merged

  • Update Base64StringAttribute.cs #86221
    area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations, community-contribution
  • For Wasi build on windows, do not set CLR_CMAKE_TARGET_WIN32 #86208
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution, os-wasi
  • Add ImmutableArray.Contains overload that accepts an IEqualityCompare… #86210
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution

Updated

  • Expose DOTNET_JitPrintInlinedMethods in Release #84606
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Always expand cctor helpers for NAOT #86147
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add message details for AmbiguousMatchException #84512
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • SHA3 #84132
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Run fgValueNumberConstLoad for invariant loads #86154
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Clean up impSpanEqualsOrStartsWith #86129
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] Enable Vector64 support on arm64 in jit mode. #86188
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [WIP] Fold const WithElement to CNS_VEC #86212
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix WaitForExitAsync could return a cancelled task #85882
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Clone files on OSX-like platforms when possible, instead of copying the whole file #79243
    area-System.IO, os-mac-os-x, community-contribution
  • Use /INCREMENTAL:NO for Debug #86170
    needs-area-label
  • ProcessTests: allow WorkingSet to be zero just after launching the process. #85649
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • feat(83547): Adding escaping of property name for GetPath. #84688
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Bugfix/30024 problem with concurrency type descriptor getconverter #85156
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • Avoid capturing the ExecutionContext for the whole HTTP connection lifetime #86213
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0

Created

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Detect and warn or error about assigning different type aliases using the same basetype. #68186

Closed

  • CDATA Block is not formatter correctly in VS #68134
    17.7 P4

PullRequests

Updated

    Area-IDE, IDE-Navigation, Navigation-Document Outline

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ANCM crashes with shadow copy enabled and the new deployment deleted a directory #48233
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudDeleteProduct #48232
  • Perf regression: mapaction #48231
  • Error - There was no runtime pack for Microsoft.AspNetCore.App available for the specified RuntimeIdentifier 'browser-wasm' #48230
  • XML request [FromBody] results in 415 error #48229

Closed

  • Perf improvement: plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #48228
  • XML request [FromBody] results in 415 error #46316
    Discussions

PullRequests

Merged

  • Add initial support for parameters with `AsParameters` attribute #47914
    area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview5

Updated

  • Remove rules associated with the auto-merge label #48227
    area-infrastructure
  • Updated the AddPolicyRegistry extension methods to use TryAdd and TryAddEnumerable internally #47821
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add dependency injection support for object pools #48217
    needs-area-label

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • On iOS grid rows that are set to star display as auto when view is added later that spans all rows and columns #15079
  • Emoji Issue on Windows #15077
  • ScrollView in Grid cell multiple issues on iOS, Android and WinUI. #15076
  • Calling API method in iOS using hot restart is not working #15075
  • When the OnColor property of Switch is set, it is applied even if when Off on iOS / Mac #15074
  • Windows Appxmanifest version info not updating when csproj version info is updated #15073

Closed

  • Button.ContentLayout="Right, xx" does not work inside of an HorizontalStackLayout #11755
    Backlog
  • Bluetooth permission getting fails on Kindle Fire, works on Galaxy ZFlip #15063

PullRequests

Merged

  • Set Icon to null and back again, working around Android issue #13267
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button

Updated

  • [ios] fix memory leak in Image #15062
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/perf 🏎️
  • Fix up Compatibility gallery #15020
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Sqlite Geometry insert via command as parameter throws: violates Geometry constraint #30890
  • Why can't I override Sqlite Smart Relational Connection? #30889
  • Connections are not closed when the DbContext is disposed #30888
  • Result not materialized using `DbSet<T>FromSql()` with json column #30887
  • Malformed JSON in SQLite query with preview 4 #30886
  • DateOnly/TimeOnly with JSON exceptions in preview 4 #30885
